{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_SargAttack}} {{doomwiki|A_SargAttack}} '''A_SargAttack'''
(no parameters)
The attack of Doom's [[Classes:Demon|Demon]]. This performs a melee attack with a base damage of 4 multiplied by a random value between 1 and 10.
== Examples == This example is taken straight from Doom's Demon.
Melee: SARG EF 8 [[A_FaceTarget]] SARG G 8 [[A_SargAttack]] goto See
[[category:Decorate Classic attack functions]]{{DEFAULTSORT:SargAttack}}
